author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
As the British Pound once mighty stands,
Its fortune wanes, like fleeting sands.
Market watchers herald change,
A Rally's end fore'er deranged.

Now hear it sung, for all to know,
EUR/USD, a peak bestowed.
At April's height, 1.1095 seen,
Downward tilts the months berthed, a skew'd machine.

In Gallic lands, the Five-Year Bonds,
Their cheapness whispers, bargains spawned.
Morgan Stanley thus decrees,
In OAT-Bund trade, their worth foresees.

feedItems.title: A Rally in the British Pound May Be Winding Down
feedItems.description: After a phenomenal run for the British pound, market watchers say the currency’s fortunes could be about to change.

feedItems.title: EUR/USD May Have Peaked at April High of 1.1095 for Now, Charts Show
feedItems.description: EUR/USD may have peaked at the April high of 1.1095 for now, based on technical charts, UOB said, adding that risk for the next two months looks tilted to the downside.

feedItems.title: French Five-Year Government Bonds Look Cheap, Morgan Stanley Says
feedItems.description: The cheapness of some French government bonds offers trading opportunities, Morgan Stanley said, which also keeps its 10-year OAT-Bund compression trade.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In AXA's realm, a rise most fair,
Demand for policies, land and air,
Two percent does grow,
More than €7.5 billion shall know.

Siemens Energy, to thee we gaze,
Full-year revenue growth, thy blaze,
Yet caution rings in margins rife,
Low guidance, Gamesa's strife.

HSBC, cautious in Asia's claim,
Wealth revenue, a growing flame,
High-single digits sought and found,
Mid-single lending growth abound.

feedItems.title: AXA Sales Edge Higher on Demand for Property Policies
feedItems.description: AXA posted a 2% rise in first-quarter revenue, helped by growth at its property and casualty business, and said it was confident of achieving underlying earnings in 2023 of more than €7.5 billion.

feedItems.title: Siemens Energy Cautious on Profit Outlook
feedItems.description: Siemens Energy lifted its full-year revenue growth target but cautioned that its profit margin before special items is now seen around the low end of its guidance range of 1%-3% due to Gamesa’s poor performance

feedItems.title: HSBC Outlines Growth Outlook for Asia Business
feedItems.description: HSBC remained cautious on its Asian business in the short-term, but forecast high-single digit percentage wealth revenue growth in the region over the next three to four years and targeted mid-single digit percentage lending growth over the medium-to-long-term.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In realms of smoke and ember fair,
A change of guard doth take the air,
Marroco steps from finance chair,
To lead BAT with Bowles' flair.

Alas, a tale of strife and discord,
An American held by sword,
In China's grasp, life's just reward,
For deeds of spy, unseen, abhorred.

Two banks stand tall on Dutch shore,
A shift in fortune, Jefferies foresaw,
ING, ABN AMRO, now explore,
Their path bestrode with triumph and roar.

feedItems.title: BAT Names News CEO
feedItems.description: British American Tobacco said Tadeu Marroco, currently the company’s finance director, has been appointed as chief executive with immediate effect to succeed Jack Bowles.

feedItems.title: China Sentences American Citizen to Life in Prison for Espionage
feedItems.description: Chinese authorities said they sentenced an American citizen to life in prison on espionage charges, in a case that could further strain relations between Beijing and Washington.

feedItems.title: ING Seen Outperforming ABN AMRO
feedItems.description: Jefferies said it’s time for a performance reversal between ING and ABN AMRO, following the Dutch lenders’ consensus-beating first-quarter results, which led the broker to upgrade its forecasts on net interest income, provisions and costs.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In market's tavern, Oneok and Magellan meet,
Merged as one firm, transporting ale complete,
For fourteen billion, their union shall hold,
A cellar vast where ales and wines be sold.

On borders new, at Joe Biden's gate,
The deterrent flow of migrant fate,
Yet, as wine doth spill, critique from left and right,
Lawsuits and claims, assail the night.

Newmont in quest of golden treasure,
Newcrest, their prize, in wealth no measure,
Seventeen and five billion tall,
The largest merger, amidst miners all.

feedItems.title: Oneok agreed to buy Magellan for $14 billion, forming one of the biggest companies involved in transporting and storing energy.
feedItems.description: Oneok agreed to buy Magellan for $14 billion, forming one of the biggest companies involved in transporting and storing energy.

feedItems.title: Biden's new border strategy so far appears to have deterred the record migrant influx many feared following the expiration of Title 42, but the revised system is already proving vulnerable to lawsuits and political attacks from the right and left.
feedItems.description: Biden’s new border strategy so far appears to have deterred the record migrant influx many feared following the expiration of Title 42, but the revised system is already proving vulnerable to lawsuits and political attacks from the right and left.

feedItems.title: Newmont said it agreed to acquire Australia's Newcrest for $17.5 billion, in what would be the largest-ever M&A deal in the gold-mining industry.
feedItems.description: Newmont said it agreed to acquire Australia’s Newcrest for $17.5 billion, in what would be the largest-ever M&A deal in the gold-mining industry.
